models.map

类 Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • models.map.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.util.Observable
    This class is the model for map. It defines the basic information and behaviors of a map, and it is observed by MapEditorView.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Xinyan, Parisa, Lin
    另请参阅:
    MapEditorView

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Map()
      Constructor to create a map It initializes the basic information of a map

      • getAuthor

        public java.lang.String getAuthor()
        This method gets the author's name of the map
        返回:
        The author's name

      • setAuthor

        public void setAuthor(java.lang.String author)
        This method sets the author's name by a given name
        参数:
        author -

      • getImage

        public java.lang.String getImage()
        This method gets the path of the map's image file
        返回:
        The image file's path of the map

      • setImage

        public void setImage(java.lang.String image)
        This method sets the image file's path as the given path
        参数:
        image - The image file's path

      • getWrap

        public java.lang.String getWrap()
        This method gets the map's wrap type
        返回:
        The wrap type of the map

      • setWrap

        public void setWrap(java.lang.String wrap)
        This method sets the wrap type based on given type
        参数:
        wrap - The given wrap type

      • getScroll

        public java.lang.String getScroll()
        This method gets the scroll type of the map
        返回:
        The map's scroll type

      • setScroll

        public void setScroll(java.lang.String scroll)
        Set the scroll typo based on given type
        参数:
        scroll - The given scroll type

      • getWarn

        public java.lang.String getWarn()
        This method gets the warn type of the map
        返回:
        The warn type of the map

      • setWarn

        public void setWarn(java.lang.String warn)
        Set the map's warn type as the given type
        参数:
        warn - The given type of warn

      • getContinentList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Continent> getContinentList()
        Get all continents in this map
        返回:
        The list of continents in this map

      • setContinentList

        public void setContinentList(java.util.ArrayList<Continent> continentList)
        Set the map's continents based on a given continents list
        参数:
        continentList - A lists of continents

      • getCountryList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryList()
        Get all countries in this map
        返回:
        The list of countries in this map

      • setCountryList

        public void setCountryList(java.util.ArrayList<Country> countryList)
        Set the map's countries based on a given countries list
        参数:
        countryList - A lists of countries

      • addContinent

        public void addContinent(Continent continent)
        Add a continent to the map, also notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        参数:
        continent - The continent need to be added

      • addCountry

        public void addCountry(Country country)
        Add a country to the map, also notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        参数:
        country - The country need to be added

      • isLoaded

        public boolean isLoaded()
        Check if the map has been successfully loaded from file
        返回:
        True if the map has been loaded from file, false if it hasn't

      • getContinentByName

        public Continent getContinentByName(java.lang.String continentName)
        Get the continent in this map based on the continent's name
        参数:
        continentName - The continent's name need to be searched in the map
        返回:
        The target continent object; null if there is no such continent

      • getContinentByID

        public Continent getContinentByID(int continentID)
        Get the continent in this map based on the continent's id
        参数:
        continentID - The continent's id need to be searched in the map
        返回:
        The target continent object; null if there is no such continent

      • getCountryByName

        public Country getCountryByName(java.lang.String countryName)
        Get the country in this map based on the country's name
        参数:
        countryName - The country's name need to be searched in the map
        返回:
        The target country object; null if there is no such country

      • getCountryByID

        public Country getCountryByID(int countryID)
        Get the country in this map based on the country's id.
        参数:
        countryID - The country's id need to be searched in the map
        返回:
        The target country object; null if there is no such country

      • updateContinentByID

        public void updateContinentByID(int continentID,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                int value)
        Update a continent's name and value in this map. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        参数:
        continentID - The id of the continent which is to be updated
        name - The new name of the continent
        value - The new value of the continent

      • updateCountryByID

        public void updateCountryByID(int countryID,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String continentName)
        Update a country's name and continent which the country belongs to in this map. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        参数:
        countryID - The id of the country which is to be updated
        name - The new name of the country
        continentName - The new continent's name which the country belongs to

      • getContinentNumber

        public int getContinentNumber()
        Get the number of continents in this map
        返回:
        The number of continents in this map

      • getCountryNumber

        public int getCountryNumber()
        Get the number of countries in this map
        返回:
        The number of countries in this map

      • removeContinentByID

        public void removeContinentByID(int id)
        Remove a continent from the map, and also remove all countries belong to this continent. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        参数:
        id - The id of the continent to be removed

      • removeCountryByID

        public void removeCountryByID(int id)
        Remove a country from the map, and also remove all connection relationships of this country. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        参数:
        id - The id of the country to be removed

      • addConnection

        public void addConnection(int countryID1,
                          int countryID2)
        Add a connection between two countries. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        参数:
        countryID1 - The id of the first country
        countryID2 - The id of the second country

      • removeConnection

        public void removeConnection(int countryID1,
                             int countryID2)
        Remove a connection between two countries. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        参数:
        countryID1 - The id of the first country
        countryID2 - The id of the second country

      • loadMapFromFile

        public boolean loadMapFromFile(java.io.File mapFile)
        Load and store map information from a .map file
        参数:
        mapFile - The file's path
        返回:
        True if the file is valid map file, false if the file is not

      • checkDuplicateContinentName

        public boolean checkDuplicateContinentName(java.lang.String name,
                                           int id)
        Check if there is a continent has the same name except itself in the map
        参数:
        name - The continent's name need to be checked
        id - The continent's id
        返回:
        True if there is a duplicate name, false if there is no duplicate name

      • checkDuplicateCountryName

        public boolean checkDuplicateCountryName(java.lang.String name,
                                         int id)
        Check if there is a country has the same name except itself in the map
        参数:
        name - The country's name need to be checked
        id - The country's id
        返回:
        True if there is a duplicate name, false if there is no duplicate name

      • saveMapToFile

        public boolean saveMapToFile(java.io.File file)
        Save the map to a .map file
        参数:
        file -
        返回:
        True if the map successfully saved, false if it is not.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        To check if the map is a valid map
        返回:
        True if it is valid, false if not

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Check if the map is a connected graph
        返回:
        True if the map is connected, false if it is not

      • dfs

        public void dfs(Country country,
                java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> countryVisited)
        dfs for country list
        参数:
        country -
        countryVisited -

      • mapOwner

        public boolean mapOwner(Player player)
        find out if player parameter is the owner of the whole map
        参数:
        player -
        返回:

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear all the information of the map. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
